Job Description: Roles and Responsibility      Write maintainable, testable, and performant code    Maintain the existing software platform code and features    Keep up to date with best practices and tooling from the C# / .NET community    Collaborate with your team to tackle problems, learn from failures, and make great products      Requirements Qualifications      We are looking for somebody who has following skills, qualifications, and characteristics:    3-5 years experience as a C# developer building .net desktop application using WinForms    3-5 years experience building rest-APIs inC#    Familiarity with DevOps tools and concepts like CI/CD (Continuous Integration / Continuous Deployment) principals    Experience working in environments where Test Driven Development (TDD) and agile methodologies are practiced    Familiarity with serverless (Lambda) AWS (especially EC2, VPCs, S3, CloudFormation) architecture is a bonus    Excellent debugging skills It would also be great      if you had:      Working knowledge of Node.js    Working knowledge Angular    Experience with AWS including API Gateway and Cognito
